content:
# DigiCamp IMPK01 for ed. 2024A ed. 04

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/digicamp-impk01-for-ed-2024a-ed-04/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:53

DigiCamp for ed. 2024A - IMPK 01 ed. 04
UNESCO AGH Chair for Science, Technology, and Engineering       Education, Krakow, Poland is starting the 4th series of online       lectures of Intensive International Intensive Programmes (IMPK) in       the field of 
Engineering for sustainable energy 
as part       of the AGH UNESCO Digital Campus of Science and Technology       (DigiCamp) project. The Fellows of the UNESCO/ Poland Co-sponsored       Fellowship Programme in Engineering, ed. 2024A were informed by       e-mail about the details of the course. Lectures will take place       on MS Teams platform.

Course begins on October 14, 2024 and will last till October 18,       2024.
       Webpage of the project:       
www.digicamp-unesco.agh.edu.pl/en/about-project/
       Webpage for the ed. 04:       
https://www.digicamp-unesco.agh.edu.pl/en/digicamp-for-ed-2024a/
